deprecated_features.title: Undocumented mbstring function aliases deprecated
deprecated_features.description: Some undocumented mbstring function aliases have been deprecated

deprecated_features.title: Case-insensitive constants deprecated
deprecated_features.description: Declaring case-insensitive constants with define() is deprecated

behavior_changes.title: Array destructuring behavior change
behavior_changes.description: Array destructuring now starts from the left side instead of right

new_features.title: Flexible Heredoc and Nowdoc syntax
new_features.description: Heredoc and nowdoc closing markers no longer need to be followed by a semicolon or newline

new_features.title: Array destructuring supports reference assignments
new_features.description: Array destructuring now supports reference assignments using the & operator
